title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 142.4 - Summary plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 142.4 - Summary plans

State Regulations

In order to be eligible to receive gifted and talented
program aid, school districts shall submit to the State Education Department, by December 1st of each year for which aid is sought, a summary plan in a form
prescribed by the Commissioner of Education. Such plan shall include
information about the scope and nature of the services provided by the school
district to gifted pupils. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
142.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
